jobTitle: Engineering Data Analyst-Product Usage Measurements & Applications

companyInfo.Competitors: FCA Fiat Chrysler Automobiles, Ford Motor Company, Toyota North America

jobDescription: The Engineering Data Analyst - Product Usage Measurements & Applications is responsible for customer vehicle usage data analysis, management, and application activities. Additional responsibilities include: Develop & maintain data reduction, conversion, and decoding algorithmsInvestigate new technologies and provide solutions to replace legacy systemsManage, process, and analyze customer vehicle usage dataSupport upgrades, maintenance and troubleshooting of customized in-house software applicationsData applications support for planning of new measurement projectsAdministrate and troubleshoot local operating system issuesBasic Required Skills:Bachelors degree in Mechanical, Electrical, or Computer EngineeringMinimum 3 years experience in Data Systems toolsProficient in C++ programmingAdvanced Microsoft Excel macro knowledgeOperating Systems knowledgeBasic knowledge of statisticsAbility to work independently and with othersHigh level of oral and written communication skillsHighly motivated, self-driven work ethicWilling to learn new technologiesPreferred Skills:Experience in migration of programming legacy systemsProficient in Visual Basic .NET FrameworkKnowledge of binary file structureMasters degree in engineeringProficient with relational database construction and administrationAlgorithm analysis knowledgeStatistical data analysis experiencePrior experience with field data acquisition systems or data analysisExpert in Microsoft Excel macro knowledgeStatistical Analysis System (SAS) training and/or experienceDemonstrated technical and professional skills in job related area
